content: perfect for fun and imaginative play delight your little one with this adorable crochet turtle charm stitched in the softness of bernat blanket and bernat blanket brights this small project is great for getting comfortable with single_crochet chain sewing and embroidery techniques make a bunch in different colors to bring smiles to everyone s faces materials bernat® blanket brights™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a pixie pink 12008 1 ball or 25 yds/23 m contrast b bright lime 12041 1 ball or 25 yds/23 m contrast c busy blue 12005 1 ball or 25 yds/23 m bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast d vintage white 10006 1 ball or 55 yds/50 m note yarn amounts for 3 turtles shown measurement approx 5½ 14 cm long
